/products/services.title: Services
/products/services.content:
Services
The diverse world of fabrics has allowed Fabricon to design and manufacture fabric structures like rigid frame awnings, canopies, wall tents and tipis that are not only functional but will enhance the look of your business, home or city. We will listen to your needs and suggest the best fabric and design to ensure the desired outcome is achieved. From start to finish Fabricon has over 41 years of experience in the fabric industry. Fabric structures have been utilized for thousands of years due to its strength and flexibility that no other building material can achieve.



Design
Our heritage goes back to designing and manufacturing era authentic Native American tipis and Outfitting gear such as horse packing equipment and wall tents. We have designed a wide variety of fabric structures and awnings throughout western Montana and the world. From small half dome awnings to cover your entry way or visually stunning and functional shade sails to add the finishing touch to your patio. Fabricon also features High quality retractable awnings and screen shades that will lower the cooling cost of you home or business during the summer months.



Manufacturing
We specialize in making unique pieces that are not only functional but also enhance the aesthetics of your property. Our facility allows us to design and fabricate custom awnings, fabrics and wall tents. Our metal shop also offers welding and bending to facilitate your custom needs.

Consultation
Fabricon is constantly consulting on some of the most innovative fabric structures in the world. Fabricon has been trusted to design Monuments (Rosebud Tribal Veterans Cemetery Committal Shelter), City Pavilions (Caras Park Pavilion) and amphitheaters (Harbourfront Amphitheater).



Repair
We have the expertise to repair most fabric products from large scale wedding tents to simple zipper repairs.
Contact us at 406-728-8300 for all your repair inquires.

/products/fabric_structures/frame_suppor.title: Frame-Supported
/products/fabric_structures/frame_suppor.content: Frame Supported fabric structures are a great solution for permanent coverage needs all while creating unique shapes only fabrics can achieve. They can be manufactured for the specific needs of the customer. From full to semi enclosed spaces, Frame supported fabric structures come in all shapes and size. With the use of modern day fabrics like PTFE, ETFE and HDPE the expected life span is comparable to traditional used construction methods. Frame structures are designed to support the fabric and its external loads. The frames generally designed to be stable regardless of whether fabric is attached or not. While the frame is not dependent on the fabric for its stability fabric can contribute to that stability. Some of the oldest frame structures used by humans are the tipis of North America and the Yurts or Kibitz of North central Asia which still find common use today as living quarters. They have been discovered in the arctic made of mammoth bone and skins.

/products/custom/specialty_production_ru.title: Specialty Product Runs
/products/custom/specialty_production_ru.content: No project is too large or too small for Fabricon. Our custom fabric shop has made an array of odd one off projects. We excel at putting your needs first and working with you to make your custom fabric ideas a reality.

/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/s.title: Screens
/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/s.content: Screen shades are an environmentally friendly alternative to costly air conditioning. The woven glass mesh fabrics used in this application enables the user to block UV heat before entering the home or business without obstructing the view from the window. When screen shades are strategically placed the need for traditional air conditioning is virtually non existent. Fabricon is a proud retailer of screen shade systems from NuImage and Solair. Our team will professionally install and service your screen shade systems ensuring your investment in quality will last for many years to come. The introduction of electric motors to screen shade systems allows the user to operated these systems with the push of a button, or pair your system to your favorite mobile device or computer and keep your space cool from anywhere in the world. Contact Fabricon today to see how we can help you with your sun control needs.

/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/f.title: Facades
/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/f.content: Building facades can be a useful medium for valuable signage, privacy or weather control. Several different types of fabrics and be utilized to create uniques looks that can transform your home or business. For example the use of a PVC coated mesh allows for ideal privacy all while retaining it’s translucent qualities.

/products/fabric_structures/tents.title: Tents
/products/fabric_structures/tents.content: Fabricon started as Blue Star Tent and Tipi manufacturing high quality wall tents and outfitting gear. The Blue Star legacy continues with Fabricon today and our superior quality of fabrics and manufacturing process ensures your purchase will last for many years to come. Whether we're designing tents for weddings or the Antarctic our focus is on tent design that withstands the elements, locations, and situations for which they are needed. Fabricon’s standard tents include outfitter wall tents as well as large push pole designs. We custom design and manufacture many tents from a broad range of types including Geodesic, Pyramid, and Period tents. Fabricon offers a wide variety of tent sizes and options as well as custom sizes. Contact Fabricon today for more information.

/products/fabric_structures/deployable.title: Deployable
/products/fabric_structures/deployable.content: Since antiquity man has utilized Deployable fabric structures because their versatility allow the user to change locations of the structure and seasonally take the structure down to avoid exposure to the elements. hese structures came be manufactured in a wide variety of materials ensuring the desired outcome is achieved.

/products/curtains_screens_and_facades.content: Through our years of experience, Fabricon has manufactured and designed a wide variety of custom enclosures for large or small patios, industrial and decorative curtains. We also install pre—manufactured exterior screen shades from NuImage and Solair that block the elements when you need them and retract to enjoy the outdoors. Adding a facade to your home or business can provide privacy or valuable signage to your property all while enhancing the aesthetics and function to fit your needs.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/canopies.title: Canopies
/products/awnings_and_canopies/canopies.content: Canopies can be manufactured in various styles, fabrics and colors. They can be a fixed molded shape or deployable in creative ways. Fabricon can help design and fabricate the canopy that gives your home or business its own unique identity. Just like awnings, canopies can be illuminated for 24 hour security and signage. Easily transform previous unusable space with addition of a custom fabricated canopy from Fabricon.

/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/c.title: Curtains
/products/curtains_screens_and_facades/c.content: Fabricon manufactures custom made curtains to fit your unique space. Whether you are inclosing a outdoor patio or creating a studio for your business, Fabricon’s expertise can help you achieve the desired outcome. With a wide variety of fabrics on the market Fabricon can help you choose the right fabric for your application.

/products/custom/marine.title: Marine
/products/custom/marine.content: Fabricon has a long history of making custom boat covers and Bimini tops. Contact Fabricon today to see how we can protect your investment.

/products/fabric_structures/shade_sails.title: Shade Sails
/products/fabric_structures/shade_sails.content: Shade Sails can create a dynamic look to either commercial or residential clients. Shade Sails are commonly tensioned between strategic anchor points creating unique convex, concave or parabolic shapes. They can be manufactured to provide limited shade and maximum aesthetics or full space coverage depending on what best suits your needs. The use of PVC coated mesh fabrics provide ample shade and heat control all while maximizing daytime luminosity creating a useable outdoor space.

/products/custom.title: Custom
/products/custom.content: At Fabricon we pride ourselves on tackling some of the more complicated and one off fabric projects. Over the years we have completed several custom fabric products for the military, private industry and residential customers with the most exacting standards. From a simple boat cover to the fabrication of specialty electron tents, Fabricon’s years of experience means your custom fabric project is in the right hands.

/products/fabric_structures/tipis.title: Tipis
/products/fabric_structures/tipis.content:
The traditional shelter for the nomadic tribes of the northern hemisphere; the conical tent, has been used globally for its ease of mobility, its sturdiness, and livability.

Achieving ultimate beauty in design and construction with the Plains tribes of the West, tipis have gained the reputation as being “distinct amongst dwellings.” Fabricon makes tipis authentic to the smallest detail and built to survive the elements they were designed to withstand. Fabricon has Tipi structures in museums across the globe including the Smithsonian institute in Washington D.C.

/home.title: Fabricon - Fabric Contractors
/home.content:
Designing and exploring the most overlooked construction material available, fabric.

Fabrics are our primary medium, and primary goal is to look for and select the appropriate fabrics, whether natural or synthetic that matches all the requirements a project is trying to accomplish. Chances are fabric probably already has a solution to your situation that no other material can offer. Ask us...

Fabric has provided solutions to our needs since antiquity.

Few materials can truly show superiority when deployed and used correctly enabling improvised solutions not available or found in other types of construction methods.

Fabric’s flexibility allows for creative shapes in design, the ability to be deployable and used multiple times at multiple locations.

Add translucency allowing views to the sky or soft diffused daylight to come through lowering the need for consumptive artificial lighting during the daytime while utilizing inner lighting at night glow that turns a project iconic.

Todays technical fabrics and films are arriving in endless varieties which can be engineered to the demands put on them acheiving what other materials can't.

Our construction methods include adhesives, sewn, welded or mechanical using the technique that provides the most desired outcome.

Fabricon has the experience to put together your next specialty fabric project.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/commercia.title: Commercial
/products/awnings_and_canopies/commercia.content: Fabricon has been designing and manufacturing awnings for commercial and residential clients since 1994. Creating eye catching designs and graphics that make your business or home stand out from others. Ideal for both identification and protection from the elements, all while providing cooling shade during hot the summer months.

/products/awnings_and_canopies/retractab.title: Retractable
/products/awnings_and_canopies/retractab.content: Adding a retractable awning to any building or residence will enhance and maximize your outdoor space. There are a wide variety of applications that can provide shade on demand. Retractable awnings that are strategically placed will also help lower the cooling cost of your business or home. The sleek design and quality manufacturing makes your investment in retractable awning pay for itself. You can even operate your retractable awning anywhere in the world through your computer or mobile device, just because you are not home doesn’t mean your retractable awning can’t help cool your home. They also feature wind sensors that will automatically retract protecting your awning from potential damage. Fabricon has years of experience servicing and installing retractable awnings in both a commercial and residential settings. We proudly sell, install and service NuImage and Solair retractable awnings. With hundreds of fabric options available we fabricate your fabric canopy in house to ensure a sharp tailored look. We offer several custom valance options adding the finishing touch. Let Fabricon help you with all your retractable awning needs.

/products/fabric_structures.title: Fabric Structures
/products/fabric_structures.content:
Fabric structures have been around since man first started weaving fibers together to make fabrics. Modern day fabric structures are becoming more popular due to the advancement of modern day synthetic fabrics, inexpensive cost compared to other construction methods and architects can achieve unique design elements only fabric can create. Larger fabric structures become focal points of forward thinking communities while providing the desired look and function. Whether you need a decorative entrance to your building, a amphitheater to host your cities festivities or a covers for horse arenas Fabricon has the expertise to design and build your fabric structure.

Their “light” footprints have been known and demonstrated countless times throughout history and pre-history(something our earliest ancestors knew) yet they receive remarkably little exposure here in the schools of North America. Compared to what other countries-including some still considered 3rd world-have come to realize. Not only is fabric a very viable structural material and protective cladding from the elements, it achieves design capabilities and energy savings other materials are incapable of matching. These structures use far less raw materials that are usually consumed in conventional structures along their ability to be repurposed or recycled allows for a more versatile structure.
Their luminosity cuts the need for daytime lighting combined with heat reflect-ability to lower cooling requirements, these are only the beginning of a list of advantages fabric has a building material in the 21st century and beyond as new fibers and technology develops.
For more infromation visit http://fabricstructures.ifai.com/resources/fabric-structures/

/products/fabric_structures/tensile.title: Tensile
/products/fabric_structures/tensile.content: Tensile fabric structures are quickly becoming a viable alternative to traditional construction methods due to it’s unlimited designs. These structures are gaining popularity throughout the world because of their lower construction cost and use of less materials during construction. With today’s modern fabrics like PTFE, ETFE and PVC these structures are expected to last longer than traditional construction materials. All while creating energy savings through the translucent nature of these fabrics. True tensile structure is one where the entire matrix of the fabric is in tension. Loss of tension can result in damage to the fabric and loss of stability even though the frame is engineered to support itself. Ideally it curves equally in opposite directions and develops 3D stability. Flatter panels need greater loads on the material to keep its shape. The frame systems used in these structures can be a single unique type Umbrella Mast… or a hybrid of an open or closed systems. Tension structures often incorporate Tensegrity shapes into its function. Whether deployable or permanent selecting fabric as a primary material offers distinct advantages over other forms of construction. Distinct advantages include flexibility in shapes, the ability to span large areas under extreme loads, outstanding translucency, and light weight low site impact. It is the proven choice for habitable shelters in some of the most extreme climate/weather conditions on the planet. We can help you at every stage of your fabric product from determining design feasibility to the development of shape/model incorporating non linear analysis to determine loads and ultimately installation of the final product.

/products/awnings_and_canopies.title: Awnings
/products/awnings_and_canopies.content: The beauty of fabric awnings or canopies are that they can be rigid and permanent or deployable and temporary. There are multiple styles and systems available with a wide variety of custom fabric options. Applications are aesthetic and functional, providing shade and sun control to protection from the elements over desired areas or valuable signage. A Retractable, Rigid Frame awning or Canopy can be a valuable addition to your commercial or residential property. Have an existing awning but need new fabric? We re-skin existing Retractable, Rigid Frame awnings and Canopies to your needs. Contact Fabricon today and let us help you with your fabric needs. For more information about what awnings can do for you visit awnings.ifai.com/commercial/ or awnings.ifai.com/residential/

/about.title: About Fabricon
/about.content:
Fabricon is here to help put together your next specialty fabric project.

Fabricon as our name suggests focuses in the construction and use of specialty fabrics whether that be through consulting, contracting, constructing and/or installation of their applications. Our palette of fabrics consists of acrylics, cotton, glass, nylon, polyester, vinyls, PTFE and HDPE while our expertise and list of materials grows.

While our focus is fabric, we continually integrate with many other materials whether that be aluminum, cable, concrete, steel, wood or composites. Our products and services cover tents and tipis made from cotton canvas, awnings and canopies of woven acrylics, polyesters and PVC’s to sophisticated tensile and frame structures created from a wide array of films and fabrics chosen for performance and needs of situations encountered. Fabricon also provides metal bending/fabrication and decorating of the fabrics with various forms of signage. Our work can be seen throughout the Northwest and we have been a part of several international projects.


We excel at one of a kind bespoke designs by providing advanced preparation, careful planning and material choices. The world of technical fabrics is complex and rapidly changing as new materials and fabrication methods emerge. "Smart Fabrics" are playing an increasing role improving our lives while structurally engineered fabrics are being developed that can span immense spaces
and achieve life spans of 50 years.

Mark, became a certified Master Fabric Craftsman in 1983 and received lifetime recognition as a Certified Master Fabric Craftsman in 2014 through the IFAI (www.ifai.com).

Mark has served on the Board of Directors of the Fabric Structures Association from 2008 until 2016. Chairing it from 2012-2014. Our work has achieved 9 international achievement awards, most recently the Award of Excellence for a frame supported tensile structure on the Rosebud Tribal Veterans Cemetery in South Dakota and an Outstanding Achievement Award for a Tensile Canopy used as building entranceway at the University of Alaska Fairbanks.

Mark began his career in 1975 making tribal tipis. Those tipis have been on display in the Smithsonian Museum in Washington, D.C., the Cody Museum in Cody, Wyoming, the Museum of Man in Toronto, Ontario Canada and the Little World Museum of Man in Japan.

In 1978 Mark expanded his horizons to design and manufacturing horse packing gear and wall tents for professional outfitters. One of his favorite projects was supplying the military tents for the film Dances With Wolves.

While still servicing Western Montana’s awning needs from frame and fabric fabrication, high quality retractable awning and innovative fabric structures.

Fabric has provided solutions to most of our needs since antiquity and a shelter few materials can truly show superiority when deployed and used correctly improvised solutions not available or found in other types. Today’s technical fabrics and films are arriving in endless varieties which can be engineered to the demands put on them. Whether it be as lifesaving fuse in an animal tracking collar or a 200M free span structure we look for the correct material for the job.

Fabricon is here to help put together your next specialty fabric project.
